title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Simplified 404 handling by replacing App Router redirection with minimal HTML response to fix hydration issues causing 500 errors.
Added `viewerCanSetFields` to `Issue` and `viewerCanSeeIssueFields` to `Repository` in GraphQL schema (FPT and GHEC).
Synced secret scanning data: set `hasValidityCheck` to `false` for WorkOS/xAI and updated config SHAs.
summary:

- Added test for language-prefixed 404s.
- Added `viewerCanSetFields` to `Issue` and `viewerCanSeeIssueFields` to `Repository` in GraphQL schema (FPT and GHEC).
- Updated GraphQL changelog for FPT.
- Synced secret scanning data: set `hasValidityCheck` to `false` for WorkOS/xAI and updated config SHAs.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Simplified 404 handling by replacing App Router redirection with minimal HTML response to fix hydration issues causing 500 errors.
- Added test for language-prefixed 404s.
- Added `viewerCanSetFields` to `Issue` and `viewerCanSeeIssueFields` to `Repository` in GraphQL schema (FPT and GHEC).
- Updated GraphQL changelog for FPT.
- Synced secret scanning data: set `hasValidityCheck` to `false` for WorkOS/xAI and updated config SHAs.

### Title
Fix 404 hydration errors, update GraphQL schema, sync secret scanning data
